com.software.reuze

Class ib_a_Ops

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.software.reuze.ib_a_Ops
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    z_BufferedImageOp
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ib_a_FilterPoint, ib_a_FilterTransform, ib_a_FilterWholeImage, ib_FilterBoxBlur, ib_FilterColorHalftone, ib_FilterCompound, ib_FilterDeinterlace, ib_FilterGradient, ib_FilterGradientWipe, ib_FilterHalftone, ib_FilterInterpolate, ib_FilterIterated, ib_FilterLensBlur, ib_FilterVariableBlur

    public abstract class ib_a_Ops
extends Object
implements z_BufferedImageOp
    A convenience class which implements those methods of BufferedImageOp which are rarely changed.

      • getRGB

        public static int[] getRGB(z_BufferedImage image,
           int x,
           int y,
           int width,
           int height,
           int[] pixels)
        A convenience method for getting ARGB pixels from an image. This tries to avoid the performance penalty of z_BufferedImage.getRGB un-managing the image.

      • setRGB

          int x,
          int y,
          int width,
          int height,
          int[] pixels)
        A convenience method for setting ARGB pixels in an image. This tries to avoid the performance penalty of z_BufferedImage.setRGB unmanaging the image.
